item.description:
Hi gang,
Seeing as though we were all crabby down at Montauk last Wednesday when Kimball's opened for the season, I figure we aught to make the extremely short hop this week out to Jaffrey and grab a Lobsta roll.

The opening day crowds will be gone (ya right) and we can enjoy the early season picnic tables under the pines (or in the parking lot) . We have until sunset at 7:36 to get in, get fed, and get out! come on we can do it!!!

Hey seafood, fried or otherwise , flying and fresh air what more could you ask for!


http://www.kimballfar...

http://www.airnav.com...



lets meet in front of the terminal 5:30 with our pre flight done and our motors purring for a wheels up at 5:45.
item.how_to_find_us: lets meet in front of the terminal 5:30 with our pre flight done and our motors purring for a wheels up at 5:45.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Lobsta roll @ Kimballs Farm Jaffery
